about_the_game:
Dive into your own pawn shop in this free shop management game! Though it may not feel like home yet, it soon will as you tidy up and launch your business. In this unique shop, you'll meet customers from all corners of the galaxy. Master the trade of alien artifacts, earthling relics, and more, as you aim to buy low and sell high for the greatest profits.

Your adventure isn't just about buying and selling. You'll also need to source parts to repair and restore the broken treasures that arrive in your shop, adding value and earning you even more Galactic Credits.

Your path to becoming a legendary interstellar entrepreneur begins here. Welcome to the galaxy's hustle, where every transaction can either catapult you to wealth or leave you floating in space.

FEATURES

  • Do business with a diverse array of customers from across the galaxy.

  • Source repair parts, fix broken items, and increase your earnings.

  • Protect your shop against thieves.

  • Take part in storage auctions. Risk your credits to possibly find treasures or end up with junk!

  • Upgrade your shop, unlock new crafting recipes, and explore different planets to find rare items.

  • Perform daring heists.
